sect2.title: Installation of shadow
sect2.para: Download the patch for shadow from .
Reinstall shadow by running the following commands:

userinput.command: LIBS="-lpam -lpam_misc" ./configure --libdir=/usr/lib \ --enable-shared --with-libpam && echo '#define HAVE_SETLOCALE 1' >> config.h && make && make install && mv /bin/sg /usr/bin && mv /bin/vigr /usr/sbin && mv /usr/lib/lib{misc,shadow}.so.0* /lib && ln -sf ../../lib/libshadow.so.0 /usr/lib/libshadow.so && ln -sf ../../lib/libmisc.so.0 /usr/lib/libmisc.so
